mapper.select: SELECT sa.id, sa.type, sa.contact_tell, sa.content, sa.memo, sa.application_date, m.id AS member_id, m.login_id, m.name, m.email, m.tell, r.role_name, r.role_flag, s.id AS service_status_id, s.service_status AS status FROM service sa JOIN members m ON sa.member_id = m.id JOIN member_role r ON m.member_role = r.role_flag JOIN service_status s ON sa.service_status = s.id

SELECT s.id, s.type, s.contact_tell, s.content, s.memo, s.application_date, m.id AS member_id, m.login_id, m.name, m.email, m.tell, r.role_name, r.role_flag, ss.id AS service_status_id, ss.service_status AS status FROM service s JOIN members m ON s.member_id = m.id JOIN member_role r ON m.member_role = r.role_flag JOIN service_status ss ON s.service_status = ss.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service ( member_id, type, contact_tell, content, memo ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{type}, #{contactTell}, #{content}, #{memo} )
mapper.select: SELECT sa.id, sa.type, sa.contact_tell, sa.content, sa.memo, sa.application_date, m.id AS member_id, m.login_id, m.name, m.email, m.tell, r.role_name, r.role_flag, s.id AS service_status_id, s.service_status AS status FROM service sa JOIN members m ON sa.member_id = m.id JOIN member_role r ON m.member_role = r.role_flag JOIN service_status s ON sa.service_status = s.id WHERE sa.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE service SET member_id = #{memberId}, type = #{type}, contact_tell = #{contactTell}, content = #{content}, memo = #{memo}, service_status = #{serviceStatus.id} WHERE id = #{id}
